questions.quote: That's it?! You call that a fight? Come on! "We were on a break!" "No we weren't!" What happened to you two?!
Oh my God, wait did I-I just said Greens don't quit didn't I? Did I just say Greens don't quit?!
Oh. That's so Monica can keep track. That way if one on them is missing, she can be like, 'Where's number 27?!'
...But, you can't actually test this theory, because today's particle accelerators are nowhere near powerful enough to simulate these conditions.
Yes. Yes it is. I burned the formula and I put your diapers on backwards. I mean, I made up a song to sing you to sleep, but that made you cry even more!
Yes-yes, I was just trying to figure out a way to uh, demonstrate how I could get my exceptionally large feet into my even bigger mouth.
Thank you, thank you. How about I do something for you? Tomorrow, I'll bring you a hat, cover up the bald?
Look at these authentic fake medals. I tell ya, mom's gonna be voted best dressed at the make-believe military academy.
Well, I mean, are you sure you want to go out with her? I mean that ain't a pretty picture in the morning, y'know what I mean. That wig all in disarray, and boobs flung over the night stand, y'know.
Ow. Um, it's just my lens. It's just my lens. I'll be right back.
